name: DIECE20
description:
DIECE20 is a fast-paced arena survival shooter based on skill and luck!

How to play:

WASD to move

Hold left mouse to roll/charge weapon (Release to shoot)

Combat tutorial:

Charge your weapon and look at an enemy to see their HP.

If your roll is a bigger number than the enemies HP, you kill them if you hit them.

If your roll has a smaller number, you deal 1 damage instead.

Your HP is displayed on the D6 in your left hand. (Also random at start)
